articles.title: Price volatility in food items seen persisting into the next year | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India's farm sector output was hit by an unprecedented weather shock in 2023, weighing on agricultural output and causing volatility in food prices. The decline in output was due to an erratic monsoon and adverse impact of El Niño.
